reviewText: This video is worth every penny, I have been a Kundalini student for over ten years now, and last year participated in a level one teacher training.  Kundalini yoga is a part of my daily life.  This video feels like being in a real class at home.  I felt like I was a part of his class, although I have to admit, there were quite a lot of people in that room, more than I would probably be comfortable with in a live class.  That being said, the exercises are doable for most people of all ages and flexibility.  Akasha's voice is soothing and encouraging.  Jai Jagdeesh is amazing as ever!  I can't say enough about this video.
A beautiful experience - the music is phenomenal.

A very good option to use it as a dairy routine of Kundalini Yoga exercise.
Very clear instructions. Really like it

This is my all time favorite Kundalini Yoga dvd! I have many and this one tops the list! I love how the exercises flow together and it is all about the heart. The singer is outstanding. Dvd makes you feel that you attended the Sat Nam Fest.
